Name: DevelopmentActivityName
Description: A name for the Development Activity. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the Development Activity. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the Development Activity. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: DesiredOutcome
Description: Describe the desired outcomes of the development activity. Address why the activity should take place, means of determining successful completion, etc.

Name: ProcessSummary
Description: Summarize the process the activity should follow to meet desired outcomes.

Name: RecommendedStaffRequirements
Description: Specify requirements for type of staffing needed to complete activity. Repeat for each staff class

Name: AdditionalRequiredResources
Description: Describe additional resources required such as funding, staffing, or resource material.

Name: DebriefingProcess
Description: Describe the debriefing process. This is especially important for assessing the quality of focus groups, cognitive interviews, etc. Specifies if debriefing is required.
